tripadvisor_monas_10: This museum is large and consists of several builds as well as extensive garden areas and open exhibits. There is equipment on show from the Indonesian Army, Navy and Airforce. The equipment shown includes planes, vehicles and guns bought from the worlds military industries and local home built equipment.
